root.name: LEGO Land
root.description: In Lego Land your objective is to rebuild Legoland theme parks which are located all around the world. It is a strategy, tycoon, managament type of game made for children, the average Lego fans. The game featured an interesting art style in which everything featured in the Legoland is made from, well, Legos. Even theme park's visitors are Lego characters.
